price: 8. (Oo Wuxuu Alle idiin abuuray) Fardo, baqallo iyo dameerro inaad kortaan iyo qurux ahaanba. Wuxuuna abuuri wax aydaan ogeyn (oo gaadiid kale ah - gaadiidka dhulka, cirka iyo baddaba).
arabic: وَٱلۡخَيۡلَ وَٱلۡبِغَالَ وَٱلۡحَمِيرَ لِتَرۡكَبُوهَا وَزِينَةٗۚ وَيَخۡلُقُ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wal-khayla wal-bighāla wal-ḥamīra litarkabūhā wazīnatan wayakhluqu mā lā taʿlamūna
